reviewText: This is a must-watch for fans Hong Kong Action Cinema. If you can forgive the CGI interstitial footage, then you will enjoy this movie.

Robin Shou has proven himself as an action star to me time and time again, and this film shows that he is a star behind the camera as well. With featured interviews and an exclusive short film cut in between that would give many Hollywood filmmakers a run for their money, Red Trousers provides background and history of a martial art that many are not aware of. The 2-disc edition has extended interviews with Sammo Hung and Lau Kar-Leung Sifu, and previews for many films that feature stunt actors who trained at the Beijing Opera School. I would say it is worth watching, especially if you enjoy action films and have wondered what goes into making the magic happen with no strings attached.
